pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gavv (2024, TV show)$(br2)Used by Gavv's $(l:gavv/riders/gavv#caking)Caking Form$(/l) and $(l:gavv/riders/gavv#blizzardsorbet)Blizzardsorbet Form$(/l)$(br2)Can summon up to 2 $(l:gavv/mobs/whipped_soldier)Whipped Soldiers$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:gavv/riders/gavv#caking)Caking Form$(/l) or $(l:gavv/riders/gavv#blizzardsorbet)Blizzardsorbet Form$(/l)
Can free villagers from $(l:gavv/items/heatpress)Hitpresses$(/l) when held in your off-hand
